sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Delivery = () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ "id": "01GEDQV9ES54ZQ82TPSMY35F9H", "budget": 50, "notes": "2 please", "status": "completed" }); const submit = async (e, type) => { e.preventDefault(); const form = new FormData(e.target); const data = Object.fromEntries(form.entries()); const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/event', { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ type, data }) }); } return

Delivery {state.id}

{state.status !== 'ready' ?
: ''} {state.status === 'collected' || state.status === 'completed' ?
: ''}
Start Delivery
Increase Budget
Pickup Products
Deliver Products
}; export default Delivery;
